turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. Could you help me with placing an order at Bella Luna Pizzeria?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I wanted to get three large pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what kind of toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: On the first, I would like pepperoni. On the second, I would like sausage and red onions. And on the third, I would like a veggie lover's pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering 3 large pizzas, 1 pepperoni, 1 sausage and red onions, 1 veggie lovers, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your total will be $72, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's fine. I wanted to get thin crust on these pizzas, will that increase the total?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i can add thin crust, that won't affect your price.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to dine-in, pick up, or have your order delivered?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your pizzas will be ready in 40 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that was it. Thank you so much for all your help.
